info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 8:48PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...AN AREA OF MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF RICHLAND...GARFIELD... DAWSON...WESTERN ROOSEVELT...MCCONE...AND CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN VALLEY COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of moderate to heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 844 PM MST, an area of moderate to heavy snow was along a line extending from near Tampico to 10 miles west of Vida and moving east at 40 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Glasgow, Wolf Point, Nashua, Fort Peck, Fort Peck Marina, Frazer, Vida, Duck Creek Rec Area, Oswego, Park Grove and Whatley. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
